Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Establishes standards for the replacement of motor vehicle windshields
Summary: Establishes standards for the replacement of motor vehicle windshields.
LawCode: Add ยง390-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to establishing automotive windshield replacement standards
